name: Shadow of the Chicken
description:
WASD (move/hold 10s to sprint) + SPACE (press - jump/hold - glide) + Mouse (look around) + Click (peck)

If slow on browser, try downloading the other builds below (Windows/Mac)

Music by: done with fish (https://donewithfish.bandcamp.com/)

Everything free in asset Store.

SFX from https://freemusicarchive.org/
